label: general_faq_question
emails: What's your return policy?
How long is shipping for order #10293? I haven't received any updates since placing the order last week.
Can I modify order #ORD-992? I need to change the color of an item. It's still showing as pending.
Where is the warranty information for product XYZ? I checked the product page but didn't see it clearly listed.
What payment methods are accepted online? I'm trying to check out but only see credit card options. Do you accept PayPal or Apple Pay?
Are there any current discount codes available? I'm about to place a large order and want to make sure I'm not missing any promotions.
How do I reset my password? The 'forgot password' link isn't sending me an email. I've checked my spam folder too.
When will product ABC be back in stock? It's been listed as out of stock for a few weeks now. Is there an estimated restock date?
What's your cancellation policy for pending orders? Order #54321 was placed by mistake right after I ordered #54320. Can I get it canceled immediately?
Do you ship internationally? What are the rates and estimated delivery times to Australia?
What are your customer service hours? Need to know when I can call to speak with someone.
How do I exchange an item? I received the wrong size for order #A-678. What's the process for sending it back and getting the correct one?
Can I track order #98765 without an account? I checked out as a guest and only have the order number from the confirmation email.
What's the process for reporting a damaged package? My delivery for #ORD-321 arrived crushed and some items are broken. What should I do next?
Is there a size guide for clothing? I'm looking at a few shirts and can't find a sizing chart on the product pages.
My payment failed for order #11223. What are common reasons for this? I've checked my card details and they seem correct.
Do you offer gift wrapping? I'm purchasing a present and would like to have it wrapped.
How can I update my billing info? My card expired and I need to change it for my upcoming subscription renewal.
What are the requirements for free shipping? My cart total is currently over $75, but it's still showing a shipping fee. Am I missing something?
Where are your store locations? I'm trying to find the nearest physical store to browse products in person.

Hi Team,

I hope this email finds you well. Could you please provide information on your standard shipping times? Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
